00010 // Dictionary keys used in BkmmFileProperties dictionaries

00155 /*
00156  @brief   An in-memory managed object context used to hold Starks
00157  structured for the external store during ixternalizations.
00158 
00159  @detail  If the instance variable exterMOC is nil, a
00160  new managed object context is created and immediately
00161  loaded by reading from the external store.
00162  
00163  The container structure of the items in the moc is
00164  that of the external store.
00165  */
00166 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  exterMOC ;
00167 
00168 /*
00169  @brief   A sqlite managed object context used to hold Starks
00170  which mirror those in a not-always-accessible external store.
00171 
00172  @detail  This is used by stores such as ExtoreDelicious whose
00173  external store is not always available, and/or whose API
00174  requires that we keep a local copy.
00175  
00176  This moc thus holds items only permanently, and therefore
00177  it uses an sqlite store on the hard drive provided by 
00178  SSYMOCManager. 
00179  */
00180 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  localMOC ;
00181 
00182 /*
00183  @brief   A wrapper around localMOC. 
00184  */
00185 @property (retain, readonly) Starker*  localStarker ;
00186 
00187 /*
00188  @brief   A wrapper around exterMOC
00189  */
00190 @property (retain, readonly) Starker*  starker ;
